page.original:
<array>.age MethodN age = <array>.age()
Get the array age semaphore, which reflects the number of changes made to the array since its creation.
Exampledim arrc[0] as c arrc[arrc.append[(] = "fred" ? arrc.age[( = 1 arrc[arrc.append[(] = "joe" ? arrc.age[( = 2 ? arrc.dump[( = fred joe See Alsoarray.touch method
